column4: hey, I'm using tor and am in chine- but my connection using tor is just too slow to have any effect usig tor, any of you have an idea how to fix this?
yeah, but it not so slow as to make it useless... i know it slows down your connection, but to the point that you can use it?
my problem is that it is just soo slow, that i get a timeout when trying to load a page
why not just not use tor....
